summary: New set of armor(LightCloth) for Both genders which can be crafted after completing Hircine's Quest - Ill met by moonlight.
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]WK6Tc6LhyTE[/youtube] [youtube]nkqBPr__LYo[/youtube]

author: Nimezis

files.name: HGO_cbbe
files.changelogHtml:
Male version added. Unenchanted light\cloth versions merged with main file.
Fixed: glossiness issue with Armored Boots\Gloves
Fixed: pants glossiness issue
Optional file added - SkyRe version
Optional file added: No Dawnguard
